name: 林忠群
objective:
本課程授課內容涵蓋廣泛共計有：(1)工程估價之基本認識、(2)工程估價之內涵、(3)各種工程之估價：1.假設工程2.基礎工程3.土石方工程4.純混凝土工程5.鋼筋混凝土工程6.預力混凝土工程7.鋼結構工程8.建築工程9.機電及附屬設備工程。
The course contents are including: (1)Basic concepts of the Construction Cost Estimation; (2)The Contents of the Construction Cost Estimation (3)The Cost Estimation of varies construction: 1. Temporary Work 2. Fundamental Work 3. Earthwork 4. Concrete Work 5. Reinforcement Work 6. Prestressed Concrete Work 7. Steel Structure Work 8. Construction Work 9. MEP(Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing).
